message.content:
# GameLord Creator Studio Dashboard UI Design

## Overall Layout & Structure
The dashboard features a dark-themed, multi-panel interface with a **dark gray/black background (#1E1E1E)** and **neon accent colors** (cyan, magenta, orange). The layout is divided into four main sections:
- Left sidebar (navigation & assets)
- Central preview area
- Bottom code editor
- Right settings panel

## Header Section
- **Top bar** with dark background containing:
  - Left: "GAME LORD" logo in bold white text with "Creator Studio" subtitle in lighter gray
  - Right: Status indicator showing "H200 Online (VRAM: 98/141GB)" with green dot indicator

## Left Sidebar (Assets & Entities)
- **Title**: "ASSETS & ENTITIES" (white text) with "15%" progress indicator
- **Navigation menu** with icons (grid, user, cube, edit, question mark, settings)
- **Entities section**:
  - Collapsible "Entities" header with dropdown arrow
  - List of game entities:
    - "Player (Active)" with blue user icon
    - "Enemy_Bot" with red robot icon
    - "Platform_Base" with gray cube icon
    - "Coin_Pickup" with orange coin icon
- **Upload Assets** section:
  - "Drag & Drop" text with upload icon
  - Three media type buttons (image, 3D model, audio) with gray icons

## Central Preview Area
- **Top bar**: "Live Preview (Level 1)" with three-dot menu
- **Game preview window**:
  - Purple/cyan cyberpunk cityscape background
  - Player character running on platforms
  - Orange coins on platforms
  - Overlays:
    - "LIVE GAME PREVIEW (HTML5/WebGL Canvas)" in black semi-transparent box
    - "CyberRunner v0.3" in top-right corner
    - "CyberRunner v0.3" and "Running Canvas" at bottom
- **Code Editor section**:
  - "OMNIBAR & CODE EDITOR" header with "25%" indicator
  - Blue-outlined text input: "Create a double jump for the player and increase enemy speed"
  - "Code" button with code icon
  - Monaco Editor showing:
    - "game_logic.py" tab with close button
    - Python code with syntax highlighting
    - "MONACO EDITOR" label in black box

## Right Settings Panel
- **Title**: "GAME STUDIO SETTINGS" (white text) with "15%" indicator
- **Game Rules section**:
  - "GENRE:" dropdown (Platformer selected)
  - "THEME:" dropdown (Cyberpunk selected)
  - "PERSPECTIVE:" dropdown (2D Side-Scroller selected)
  - Toggle switches for:
    - "Enable Gravity (ON)" (blue toggle)
    - "Enable Enemies (ON)" (blue toggle)
    - "Double Jump (ON)" (blue toggle)
- **AI Settings section** (collapsible):
  - "Hyperparameters" header
  - Sliders for:
    - "TEMPERATURE" (0.7) with blue slider
    - "TOP_P" (0.9) with blue slider
    - "CONTEXT LENGTH" (32k) with blue slider
  - "System Prompt Override" text area with default Python developer prompt

## Color Scheme
- **Primary**: Dark gray/black (#1E1E1E)
- **Accent colors**: Cyan (#00D4FF), magenta (#FF00FF), orange (#FFA500)
- **Text**: White for headers, light gray for body text
- **UI elements**: Blue for interactive components, gray for inactive states

## Typography
- **Headers**: Bold, larger sans-serif (Arial or similar)
- **Body text**: Regular sans-serif
- **Code**: Monospace font (Monaco) with syntax highlighting

## Interactive Elements
- Toggle switches (blue when active)
- Dropdown menus with chevron indicators
- Collapsible sections with arrow icons
- Input fields with blue focus borders
- Buttons with hover states
- Tab interface for code files

This design emphasizes a modern, tech-focused aesthetic suitable for game development, with clear visual hierarchy and intuitive organization of tools and settings.
